body_html: if you are using CIFAR-10/CIFAR-100 then this parameter is fairly irrelevant. Were you using a large number of workers before? if you have a core i7 (4-core?) and you used more than 4 workers, it might start intermittent freezing as the CPU is all occupied by the workers.
body_text: if you are using CIFAR-10/CIFAR-100 then this parameter is fairly irrelevant. Were you using a large number of workers before? if you have a core i7 (4-core?) and you used more than 4 workers, it might start intermittent freezing as the CPU is all occupied by the workers.
body: if you are using CIFAR-10/CIFAR-100 then this parameter is fairly irrelevant. Were you using a large number of workers before? if you have a core i7 (4-core?) and you used more than 4 workers, it might start intermittent freezing as the CPU is all occupied by the workers.
